summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Thamboora Restaurant website. All backend APIs and frontend components are functioning perfectly with excellent user experience.
passed_tests: Backend API health check - all endpoints responsive
Reservation API - create and retrieve reservations working perfectly
Frontend page load and hero section with animations
Navigation smooth scroll to all sections working
About section displays correctly with proper images
Signature Highlights section shows 3 dishes with hover effects
Menu section - all 7 category tabs switching correctly (Biryani, Indian, Tandoor, Continental, Oriental, Breads, Fondue)
Gallery section displays all 5 restaurant images in tetris grid layout
Reservation form validation and successful submission to backend API
WhatsApp reservation and contact buttons functional
Location section with Google Maps embed working
Typography using correct fonts - Playfair Display for headings, Manrope for body
Color scheme matches warm ochre/gold palette (#C7A17A)
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI components and integrations working)
